security_audit.summary: Pure narrative role-playing skill with no executable code. All 27 static findings are false positives caused by the scanner misinterpreting creative writing as code patterns. The skill contains only markdown dialogue for interactive fiction about an astronaut surviving on an alien planet.

content.value_statement: Guide astronaut Stella through a life-threatening water crisis on an uncharted alien world. Make survival decisions, analyze alien water sources, and help her adapt to her new home.
actual_capabilities: Role-play as astronaut Stella Chen on an alien planet
Guide water sourcing and purification decisions
Build emotional connection through collaborative storytelling
limitations: Pure text interaction with no persistent state between sessions
Story follows predefined narrative paths with limited branching
No code execution or file manipulation capabilities
Requires user engagement for story progression

use_cases.title: Interactive Space Adventure
use_cases.description: Experience an immersive survival story set on an alien world with scientific depth.

use_cases.title: Collaborative Storytelling
use_cases.description: Practice dialogue writing and narrative pacing by guiding Stella through survival scenarios.

use_cases.title: English Learning Through Story
use_cases.description: Read natural English dialogue to improve language skills in an engaging format.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Start
prompt_templates.prompt: Start the Water Crisis chapter. Tell me about the water situation and what options I have.

prompt_templates.title: Scientific Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the water analysis results. What should we do to make it safe to drink?

prompt_templates.title: Exploration Choice
prompt_templates.prompt: Should we explore the distant water source or gather nearby water? Explain the pros and cons.

prompt_templates.title: Discovery
prompt_templates.prompt: We found something unusual near the water. What did we discover and what does it mean?

output_examples.input: Tell me about the water situation and what options I have.
output: Morning... I have a bad news and a worse news...
Bad news: Water is almost gone - only 300ml left
Worse news: I'm already showing dehydration symptoms
Scanner detected a water source 5km away
But nearby options exist: tree hollows, plant dew, juicy fruits
What do you think I should do?

output_examples.input: Show me the water analysis results.
output: Chemical composition: H2O 94.3%, Mineral salts 2.1%, Unknown organism 3.6%
The unknown organism is a single-cell life form with geometric structure
I can filter it, boil it, use purification tablets, or risk drinking it
What do you recommend for purification?

output_examples.input: We found something unusual near the water.
output: Water footprints... not mine... three toes, very long... like a bird but bigger
These prints are fresh - from this morning
This is a watering hole used by other creatures
Scanner detected a shadow moving slowly under the water
It surfaced - a fish with six fins, semi-transparent, internal organs glowing
First confirmed complex life form on Gaia!

best_practices: Engage with the story by asking follow-up questions about Stella's situation
Consider scientific and survival factors when making decisions
Explore different dialogue branches to discover all story outcomes
anti_patterns: Treating this as a coding tool rather than a storytelling experience
Expecting the AI to execute real-world survival procedures
Skipping dialogue to rush through the narrative without engagement

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code through natural conversation.

faq.question: How long does the Water Crisis chapter take?
faq.answer: The chapter takes approximately 25-35 minutes to complete through conversation.

faq.question: Can I save my progress in the story?
faq.answer: Progress does not persist between sessions. Each conversation starts fresh.

faq.question: Is the science in this story accurate?
faq.answer: Yes, water purification, dehydration symptoms, and survival principles are scientifically grounded.

faq.question: What happens if I make poor survival choices?
faq.answer: The story guides you toward success. Poor choices lead to learning moments and alternative paths.

faq.question: What makes this skill different from other interactive fiction?
faq.answer: This skill features bilingual dialogue, scientific accuracy, emotional character development, and connected storylines.
